params.message: Permit end date must be the end of the quarter in which the permit starts
Loaded GVW must be greater than zero for the selected conditional license fee type
Net weight must be greater than zero for a farm vehicle
Net weight may not exceed 24,400 kg for a farm vehicle
Loaded GVW may not exceed 63,500 kg
BC plated vehicles do not require this permit
Vehicle type not permittable for this permit type
Duration must be 7 days or less
Vehicle configuration is not permittable for this commodity

trailerCategories.name: Accessory trailer such as jeep or booster, to be used alongside other trailers. Not permittable on its own as a trailer in a combination.
Placeholder for a trailer in a combination with no trailer (such as when a brushcutter is permitted with no trailer).
